text: Amenepu ngei kai, among dêna ku lungdo sin ngei chu, ka Pa renga rachamneina ka man dên hah pêk ki tih: jâttin chunga thîr tôkmol le roijêka pil bêlngei anga ahârhâra tôkkhoi chit rangin rachamneina pêk ngei sa ki tih. Jîng sikhovâr khom pêk ngei sâng ki tih.2:26-28: Lap 2:8-9 (LXX)
